title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
synopsis: A young woman in ancient China longs for an adventurous life rather than a dull arranged marriage in Ang Lees Oscar-winning martial arts epic.

title: Finding Dory
synopsis: A sudden flash of memory drives Nemos forgetful friend to seek out her lost past and reunite with loved ones, with the help of buddies old and new.

title: Finding Dory
synopsis: A sudden flash of memory drives Nemos forgetful friend to seek out her lost past and reunite with loved ones, with the help of buddies old and new.

title: Hero
synopsis: The Qin king is the target of three assassins, until a nameless warrior steps up to claim he has defeated them all in this stunning martial arts epic.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
synopsis: Sing, a mobster in 1940s China, longs to be as cool as the formally clad Axe Gang, a band of killers who rule Hong Kong, but can only pretend.

title: Infernal Affairs
synopsis: A veteran cop goes undercover to expose a detective who leaks information to the criminal underworld, but the mole doesnt know whos tracking him.

title: Shaolin Soccer
synopsis: A down-and-out ex-soccer player joins forces with a former monk to assemble an unlikely team of players to win the China Super Cup soccer tournament.

title: Drunken Master
synopsis: An exasperated father enlists the help of a sadistic drunken-style kung fu master to teach his mischievous teenage son some discipline.

title: Police Story
synopsis: Jackie Chan, who also directs, stars as Kevin, a Hong Kong cop assigned to guard a key witness in the trial of a mobster he had single-handedly captured. But when Kevin is duped by the comely witness, the drug boss is released for lack of evidence.

title: Infernal Affairs 2
synopsis: When a policeman learns that a recruit recently booted from the academy is the brother of an organized crime boss, he hires him to go undercover.

title: CJ7
synopsis: When Dickys dad gives him a strange, green ball, it turns out the unassuming present is actually an alien endowed with unearthly powers.

title: Jackie Chans Project A
synopsis: In this action flick, a sailor in turn-of-the-century Hong Kong sets out to stop buccaneers from running roughshod over the South China Sea.

title: Infernal Affairs 3
synopsis: Former Triad member Ming sets out to uncover any remaining Triad moles within the police force, but his maverick style proves problematic.

title: Wheels on Meals
synopsis: Chan and Biao operate a catering van in Barcelona, Spain. When they discover a girl has been kidnapped by a local gang, they swing into action.

title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
synopsis: Playing the hero first portrayed by Bruce Lee in Fist of Fury, Donnie Yen reprises his role as Chen Zhen in this breakneck kung fu thriller.

title: Election
synopsis: With Hong Kongs oldest triad on the verge of electing a new boss, the stage is set for an all-out battle between the two leading contenders.

title: Project A 2
synopsis: After he defeats a pirate, Dragon Mao gets offered the lead slot on the municipal police squad -- and discovers corruption deep within the department.

title: The Mermaid
synopsis: When egocentric tycoon Xuans plans for a pristine ocean reserve threaten the merpeople living there, comely mermaid Shan is sent to ice him.

title: Kung Fu Yoga
synopsis: Two mismatched archaeologists battle a team of vicious mercenaries in a race to discover an ancient Tibetan treasure of unimaginable worth.

title: Secret
synopsis: Enchanted by a pretty pianist and the haunting melody she plays, a musical prodigy falls in love. But a secret soon threatens to derail their romance.

title: Dragons Forever
synopsis: When a lawyer realizes that his client is involved in the drug business, he teams up with his buddies to take on the villains and their criminal ways.

title: The Five Venoms
synopsis: A dying kung fu master sends his last student to track down five former pupils in order to learn which one of them has become evil.

title: Chinese Odyssey (Part II), A
synopsis: After using the Pandoras Box, Joker finds himself stuck centuries in the past, where he encounters his old master and an array of villains.

title: Election 2
synopsis: Ambitions and egos clash in a fierce power struggle for triad leadership, ensnaring contenders in a web of business schemes and political agendas.

title: Chinese Odyssey (Part I), A
synopsis: When the Goddess of Happiness tosses the Longevity Monk and his disciples out of heaven (because the Monkey King tried to attain immortality), the Monkey King is reincarnated as the Joker. He now spends his time chasing two jealous women.

title: Ilo Ilo
synopsis: Leaving the Philippines to work in Singapore, Teresa is hired as a maid by a couple whose spoiled son delights in bullying and belittling her.

title: A Battle of Warriors
synopsis: In ancient China, a warlord sets his sights on conquering the city-state of Liang, where a lone warrior takes it upon himself to defend the residents.

title: Monkey King: Hero Is Back
synopsis: Released from his ice cage after centuries, a fallen but still quite mystical monkey warrior makes saving a village from monsters his first priority.

title: Return To The 36th Chamber
synopsis: When thugs prey upon innocent factory workers, a small-time scammer trains for revenge by studying the moves of Shaolin temple monks.

title: The Monkey King 2
synopsis: After escaping the Mountain of Five Elements, the Monkey King accompanies the young monk who freed him on a dangerous quest to recover sacred scrolls.

title: Love In A Puff
synopsis: When the Hong Kong government enacts a ban on smoking cigarettes indoors, the new law drives hard-core smokers outside, facilitating a meeting between Cherie, a makeup saleswoman, and Jimmy, an advertising exec.

title: Love on Delivery
synopsis: To prove himself to a love interest, a delivery boy learns dubious kung fu from an aging charlatan so he can challenge his archrival to a fight.

title: Finding Mr. Right
synopsis: A Chinese tycoons mistress flees to Seattle to have their baby out of the tabloid spotlight, and unexpectedly falls in love with her driver.

title: Hero
synopsis: A pugilist from Shantung struggles to rise to the top of the Shanghai triad ladder, where his stellar martial arts talents can shine.

title: Justice, My Foot!
synopsis: Slick lawyer Sung fears hes been cursed with bad karma and considers giving up his practice -- until hes approached by a widow accused of murder.

title: Persona
synopsis: A private investigation firm takes on sensitive cases while its uniquely skilled agents deal with issues both inside and out of the office.

title: So Young
synopsis: This coming-of-age story follows a girl through college in 1990s China, where she forges intimate relationships and learns important life lessons.

title: League of Gods
synopsis: Possessed by a demon and bewitched by a supernatural concubine, a power-mad king wages war against the forces of light in his bid for world conquest.

title: Ultimate Beastmaster China
synopsis: Bin Gu and Qinyi Du host an intense obstacle course competition featuring world-class athletes from China and five other countries.

title: Love In The Buff
synopsis: Cherie and Jimmys relationship is strained by forgotten birthdays and clashing personalities. But their chemistry cant be easily snuffed out.

title: Disciples Of The 36th Chamber
synopsis: Shaolin monk San Te returns to protect a fellow hero with a talent for finding trouble in this action-packed sequel to The 36th Chamber of Shaolin.

title: Monk Comes Down the Mountain
synopsis: In 1930s Hangzhou, a banished monk encounters wise masters who impart fantastic kung fu techniques, preparing him for a fight with evil incarnate.

title: Big Fish and Begonia
synopsis: A girl from a mystical realm transforms into a dolphin to explore the human world, where an encounter with a young man propels her on a fateful quest.

title: Vulgaria
synopsis: Struggling movie producer To Wai-chen needs money for child support, so he reluctantly agrees to film a softcore remake of a Chinese classic.

title: Gone with the Bullets
synopsis: In 1920s Shanghai, a crook schemes to launder money via a beauty pageant. But when a contestant turns up dead, the cops suspect hes the killer.

title: The Legend of Bruce Lee
synopsis: The brief but spectacular career of martial arts superstar Bruce Lee is recounted in this drama, starring Danny Chan as the enigmatic and driven Lee.

title: Rumble in Hong Kong
synopsis: A young martial arts master must defend himself and his aging master against wandering bandits who wrongly believe he is a murderer.

title: The Mad Monk
synopsis: To avoid punishment for his misdeeds, an arrogant god accepts a mission to reform three mortals on earth, where he must also contend with a demon.

title: Legendary Weapons of China
synopsis: Three assassins -- magician Lei Ying, hit man Tieh Hon and kung fu master Ti Tan -- are sent to Yunnan by their clan leader to bring to justice another clan member who betrayed the tribe.

title: Empresses in the Palace
synopsis: In 1722 China, betrayal, treachery and corruption torment the women in the imperial harem as they struggle to gain power and the Emperors favor.

title: Keeper of Darkness
synopsis: An exorcist with a knack for taming vengeful spirits becomes a sensation after video of his work goes viral, attracting unwanted attention as well.

title: Huang jin shi dai
synopsis: The story of writer Xiao Hong comes alive through memories of her great love affair, literary influence and escape from China during World War II.

title: The Stolen Years
synopsis: When a woman wakes up from an accident with amnesia, the ex-husband she doesnt recall divorcing helps her figure out why her life is now in shambles.

title: Sky Ladder: The Art of Cai Guo-Qiang
synopsis: Known for his spectacular pyrotechnic displays, Chinese artist Cai Guo-Qiang creates his most ambitious project yet in this breathtaking documentary.

title: Office
synopsis: In this offbeat musical, intertwined office romances and complex financial schemes unravel at a Chinese trading firm during the 2008 financial crisis.

title: Finding Mr. Right 2
synopsis: Two people write heartfelt letters to each other from different continents. As feelings intensify, they wonder where, or if, they should connect.

title: Shanghai Grand
synopsis: A Taiwanese fugitive befriends a rising mobster in triad-run Shanghai, but love, ambition and secret agendas threaten their brotherly bond.

title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
synopsis: A young fighter joins an undercover clan of flying, metal-slinging, magical warriors to save the world from a dark and mystical force.

title: Paradise in Service
synopsis: In Taiwan in the late 60s, a young man joins the military on the brink of war and is assigned to Unit 831, where he manages a state-operated brothel.

title: Meteor Garden
synopsis: Dong Shancai is determined to excel at her dream university, where she encounters an elite clique of dashing, popular high-achievers -- and finds love.

title: Lifeline
synopsis: Johnnie Tos character-centered drama follows a Hong Kong firefighting crew as they take on harrowing rescue missions and navigate personal dilemmas.

title: The Bodyguard
synopsis: A retired security officer with dementia befriends a little girl whose father is running from the mob. To save her, his old skills start to kick in.

title: The Bare-Footed Kid
synopsis: While working at a family friends business, a penniless orphan draws the attention of a corrupt competitor and is torn between divided loyalties.

title: Ice Fantasy
synopsis: The Ice Tribe prince journeys to a sacred mountain to vanquish evil but soon finds himself at war with the Fire Tribe, led by his long-lost brother.

title: Look Out, Officer
synopsis: An officer killed on the job returns to Earth as a ghost to solve his own murder and seek justice with the help of a rookie cop and some funky magic.

title: The Way We Dance
synopsis: After dropping out of her universitys dance crew, a working-class student finds inspiration in tai chi for her own unique style of street dancing.

title: Tik Tok
synopsis: A police officer and a psychologist learn of a sinister threat at a highly anticipated soccer match and team up in hopes of preventing disaster.

title: Opium and the Kung Fu Master
synopsis: Leader of the Ten Kwangtung Tigers, Tieh Chiao-san works with his kung fu students to protect his village from crime. But when an opium dealer starts to ruin the town, Tieh Chiao-san struggles to fight back, thanks to his growing opium addiction.

title: Day and Night
synopsis: A detective assists with an investigation into a brutal mass murder case in which his twin brother is the prime suspect.

title: Hide and Seek
synopsis: While living a comfortable life with his wife and child, a germophobic man realizes his estranged brother may have committed a terrible crime.

title: The Precipice Game
synopsis: A carefree young woman joins her boyfriend on a cruise-ship treasure hunt but soon finds herself in a fight for survival when the game turns deadly.

title: 7 Assassins
synopsis: When the governments gold is stolen in ancient China, elite royal guards are sent to reclaim it. They soon learn they arent alone in their pursuit.

title: Good Time
synopsis: Two successful professionals in a complicated relationship have no use for marriage. But through times thick and thin, their attitudes change.

title: Temporary Family
synopsis: Four young Hong Kong residents, each in their own bind, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

title: My Schoolmate, the Barbarian
synopsis: A brainy private school student is transferred to a far less elite institution, where he must fend off classmates who settle scores with fistfights.

title: Simply Actors
synopsis: A cop who loves performing is thrilled when hes assigned to attend acting classes undercover but disappointed to learn his wacky style is unwelcome.

title: Youre My Destiny
synopsis: A young womans romantic cruise ends in a twist when she gets pregnant after a one-night stand with a rich executive, turning their lives upside down.

title: Loving You
synopsis: Struggling in a loveless marriage, a hard-drinking, workaholic cop finds a chance at redemption after a fateful incident leaves him wounded.

title: Autumns Concerto
synopsis: After losing all memories of his past, a wealthy lawyer travels to a rural village where a woman he once loved now lives with her son.

title: The Disguiser
synopsis: Secret agent Ming Tai, his siblings and his shadowy partner work covertly to undermine Shanghais Japanese occupiers and their allies.

title: Painted Faces
synopsis: In this dramatized rendition, students undergo rigorous study at Master Yus Peking Opera school, a cradle for future Hong Kong film stars.

title: Casino Tycoon
synopsis: When Japanese troops invade Hong Kong, young Benny Ho flees to Macau and rises to the top of the citys casino business with pluck, diligence and wit.

title: Our Shining Days
synopsis: In a battle of the bands, a percussions student and her musical kindred spirits set out to prove the merits of Chinese folk against the Western canon.

title: Twenty Two
synopsis: Hundreds of thousands of women were forced into sexual slavery in Japanese-occupied China during World War II. Here, 22 survivors share their stories.

title: Just You
synopsis: When her uptight new boss and landlord starts a war on office romances, plucky Liang-liang quickly starts looking for ways to get him to lighten up.

title: When a Snail Falls in Love
synopsis: Two talented crime solvers share a connection, but when one wants the relationship to move faster than the other, things get complicated.

title: May We Chat
synopsis: A messaging app unites a mute prostitute, an unruly rich girl and a stormy young woman, three Hong Kong teens living in pain and excess.

title: Dot 2 Dot
synopsis: Newly arrived in Hong Kong, a language teacher is fascinated by the mysterious dot graffiti in subway stations and tries to discover its meaning.

title: A Boy Name Flora A
synopsis: A 28-year-old layabout begins to re-examine his life when his dysfunctional family assembles to pay respects to a dying grandmother who won’t pass on.

title: King of Peking
synopsis: Strapped for cash, a traveling projectionist begins to run a DVD pirating business, putting him at odds with his young, skeptical son.

title: A Journey Through Time with Anthony
synopsis: A young man from Dalian pursues his studies in Melbourne, where he undergoes love, loss and self-discovery in this coming-of-age tale.

title: Little Dragon Maiden
synopsis: Seeking to improve his combat skills, a young man falls in love with a woman with mystical powers, but his past stands in the way of their union.

title: Bromance
synopsis: Ya-nuos been raised as a boy. Now at age 25, shes caught the eye of a triad leaders sister. But what happens when she reveals her true gender?

title: Days We Stared at the Sun
synopsis: A model student resorts to violence after witnessing greed and corruption wreak havoc on his life.

title: A Touch of Green
synopsis: Amid the turmoil of Chinas civil war, families of Kuomintang pilots face the pain of leaving their homes but find strength in their shared bonds.

title: Office Girls
synopsis: A department store mogul has his son work incognito in a menial job to prove his worthiness, while female co-workers teach him how normal people live.

title: The Young Vagabond
synopsis: To avenge his master, a wine-loving young man steps up his fighting skills to defeat a powerful thief in a life-or-death match.

title: The Prince Who Turns into a Frog
synopsis: Before his wedding, a cold CEO is hit by a car and awakens a changed man. As he and the driver fall in love, more changes appear on the road ahead.

title: Someone to Talk To
synopsis: A man is embittered by a decade-long marriage beset by communication problems, while his sister begins to reflect on her own marriage of convenience.

title: Dwelling Narrowness
synopsis: Two city-dwelling sisters help each other cope with skyrocketing housing prices as they also struggle with careers, relationships and heartbreak.

title: A Complicated Story
synopsis: A cash-strapped mainland Chinese student signs a surrogacy contract with a Hong Kong couple, but the agreements abrupt end throws her life into chaos.

title: Shark Busters
synopsis: Hit by a media storm over his own mounting debts, a police officer leads an investigation against the loan sharks behind a sinister credit scheme.

title: On the Wrong Track
synopsis: Two rebellious, hot-headed teenage brothers get caught up in gang life, which has dangerous repercussions for their family and friends.

title: Queen of No Marriage
synopsis: Sparks begin to fly when a successful 33-year-old single woman and a 25-year-old romantic with few prospects navigate love and differences.

title: The Fierce Wife
synopsis: Beautiful housewife Xie An Zhen seems to be living the perfect life but finds her world crumbling after learning that her husband is cheating on her.

title: Miss Rose
synopsis: Resolving to get married soon, hardworking Si-yi finds love in an unexpected place, but her ex and her job interfere with her plans.

title: Cherry Returns
synopsis: Following years in captivity, a young woman returns to her family, while a detective pieces together the clues linked to her mysterious abduction.

title: Be with You
synopsis: After reconnecting with their girlhood crushes, two sisters find their lives turned upside down by surprising revelations and romantic intrigue.

title: Burning Ice
synopsis: While trying to protect a loved one, a white-collar worker is drawn into an intricate murder plot that tests the limits of his will to survive.

title: Love, Now
synopsis: When her loved ones cook up a morbid plan to make her take time off from work, Yang Yi Ru goes on a vacation, truly believing she has terminal cancer.

title: Love Around
synopsis: After a chance meeting at a ballpark, the kind son of a former gangster tries to help an outgoing radio DJ get over her recent heartbreak.

title: Tientsin Mystic
synopsis: In an otherworldly river town, a policeman follows the trail of a sinister force to save his community from deadly spells.

title: All Quiet in Peking
synopsis: Amid Chinas economic collapse in the late 40s, Kuomintang leader Chiang Chingkuo launches a campaign to oust corrupt bigwigs in his flagging party.

title: Life plan A and B
synopsis: Two parallel life paths begin for a man and woman in love after she is offered a lucrative promotion far away and must choose between love and career.

title: Everybodys Fine
synopsis: When his children cancel their visit, a widower travels to the far corners of the country to call on them, discovering the hidden sides of their lives.

title: What a Wonderful Family!
synopsis: In a large family living under one roof, a storm brews when the matriarch requests a divorce from her husband on their 50th anniversary.

title: Mr. Virgin
synopsis: When a young man ignores a feng shui master’s warning and decides to marry before turning 30, a series of mishaps begins to curse his life.

title: Boundless
synopsis: A film student follows Hong Kong cinema legend Johnnie To on and off the set, as the filmmaker reflects on the industry, his career and creative process.

title: Us and Them
synopsis: Two strangers meet on a train and form a bond that evolves over the years. After a separation, they reconnect and reflect on their love for each other.

title: In Between
synopsis: An author having trouble finishing his new romance novel because hes lost faith in love regains his romantic soul after meeting a flight attendant.

title: Mahjong Heroes
synopsis: In this comedy, characters from all walks of life go head-to-head around the mahjong table in a high-stakes contest of different playing styles.

title: Refresh Man
synopsis: Ten years after a once-promising student graduates, she finds herself working at a cosmetics company run by the boy with the worst grades in school.

title: Close Your Eyes Before Itâ€™s Dark
synopsis: While vacationing at a mountain cabin, a group of longtime friends uncovers an old scandal that could have deadly consequences.

title: An Innocent Mistake
synopsis: Raised by three mothers, a self-assured teen in turmoil meets the father figure she never had. But she also stands to drive the man and his son apart.

title: La Femme
synopsis: Personal desires guide the lives of a marriage-averse entrepreneur, a housewife coping with infidelity and a career woman who leaves her spouse.

title: Sudden
synopsis: A car accident sends four lawyers spiraling in different directions as they scramble to rebuild their shattered lives.

title: The Year of Happiness and Love
synopsis: Jiang Chen-bo is a loser without prospects for success, until a surprise promotion becomes the catalyst for his entire familys upturn in fortune.

title: Whos The One
synopsis: A doctor performs plastic surgery on a fat man whos been jilted, and continues his transformation by turning him into a handsome, desirable man.

title: Love Through a Millennium 2
synopsis: Due to time travel, a gourmet chef in 1936 Shanghai and a wealthy young man in 2016 Paris discover their lives and loves to be inextricably linked.

title: Diamond Lover
synopsis: After an accident leads to great weight loss, once-obese Mi Duo embarks on a new life working for her secret crush, diamond company CEO Xiao Liang.

title: Best Get Going
synopsis: Four graduating college students venture out into the working world as interns, balancing friendship and romance with a shared pressure to succeed.

title: The Posterist
synopsis: This documentary pays tribute to Yuen Tai-yung, the artist behind the iconic, hand-painted posters created during the golden age of Hong Kong cinema.

title: What She Put on the Table
synopsis: Based on the life of TV chef Fu Pei-mei, this drama follows two women -- one rich, the other poor -- who fortuitously cross paths in 1950s Taiwan.

title: A Good Wife
synopsis: As her seemingly idyllic life begins to crumble, a lonely woman in a restrictive marriage starts an affair with a gentle bookstore owner.

title: What Is Love?
synopsis: A 32-year-old romantic looking for a long-term, monogamous relationship meets a handsome bad boy who only believes in one-night stands.

title: The New World
synopsis: A woman who wants to reunite with three childhood friends becomes embroiled in events that unwittingly connect them all in political corruption.

title: Prince William
synopsis: Banking on their identical looks, a fish vendor poses as a beleaguered real estate developer, who promises to save his home from demolition in return.

title: Love Cuisine
synopsis: A successful Taiwanese chef moves home from Europe to teach at a cooking school. He soon clashes with a pretty teacher he met under odd circumstances.

title: Rouge
synopsis: After being mistaken for an enemy spy in 1937 China, a desperate woman tries to acquit herself by agreeing to sniff out a traitor among her friends.

title: Mind Game
synopsis: With the help of a cop, a psychologist and a woman who can foretell the future, a brilliant paralegal works to solve an array of perplexing mysteries.

title: The Dream Job
synopsis: A mysterious, wealthy man offers three people a lucrative, unusual job that may be too good to be true: Live the high life as his children and heirs.

title: The Truth Seekers
synopsis: A veteran cop forms an agency dedicated to solving cold cases, including those related to the team members own painful and mysterious pasts.

title: Yours Fatefully
synopsis: Two lonely singles meet on a blind date and slowly get to know each other, unaware that their parents are friends and may be falling in love.

title: Yes We Can!
synopsis: When a frustrated businessman starts his own firm, it soon morphs into a way to help senior citizens refresh their dying traditional trades.

title: Miss in Kiss
synopsis: A quirk of fate sends an ordinary, sweet-natured high school girl and her father into the home of the school genius, on whom she has a huge crush.

title: Casino Tycoon 2
synopsis: Casino mogul Benny Ho wields enormous power. But a feud with his former partner and a massive fraud scheme soon threaten his family and his empire.

title: Spice Up
synopsis: A spoiled young woman steps in to save her family’s restaurant with her cooking and tasting skills while balancing her complicated love life.

title: World At Your Feet
synopsis: A group of struggling individuals are united by a love of soccer. At the center is Renxin, a reclusive widower and former coach who needs new hope.

title: King’s War
synopsis: In 210 B.C., during the upheaval following the death of Emperor Qin, insurgent warriors Xiang Yu and Liu Bang fight for control of the Chinese empire.

title: 我最好朋友的婚礼
synopsis: Asked to be her childhood friends best man, a fashion journalist realizes she secretly loves the groom and hatches a plan to win him back.

title: Qin Empire: Alliance
synopsis: During the Warring States period, Qin state ruler Duke Xiao recruits statesman Shang Yang to help enact bold reforms that transform western China.

title: Best Lover
synopsis: Two young stars with different backgrounds and agendas enter into a fake marriage to advance their careers, until the fake starts turning real.

title: Singles Villa
synopsis: In a luxurious condominium complex with draconian rules forbidding all romance, two residents fall in love and dare to start a secret relationship.

title: Game Winning Hit
synopsis: An army deserter hiding out in a small coastal town becomes the coach of a youth baseball team and develops warm relationships in his new community.

title: The Liar
synopsis: At the CARE detective agency, investigators see a lot of action but must always keep their cases secret, even when it affects their personal lives.

title: Initial D: Special Edition
synopsis: By day, an 18-year-old delivers tofu for his father, a retired race car driver; but by night, its the teens turn to take the wheel.

title: Love Cheque Charge
synopsis: Three years after making a wild promise to a woman in distress, a rigid businessman runs into her again and must decide whether to honor his word.

title: Murphys Law of Love
synopsis: An online matchmaker whos convinced shes living under a curse finds her theories on life and love tested when she meets a shrewd divorce expert.

title: The Bittersweet
synopsis: As a killer stalks the streets, a troubled young courier suspects that a doctor may be the long-lost sister he hasnt seen since childhood.

title: The Womanizer
synopsis: Libertine He-jie finds himself torn between the lovely Amanda and fiery Xiao-qian. But now he faces a new problem: arrogant rival suitor Cheng-en.

title: Hey, Kids!
synopsis: Three adult siblings face difficult choices as they struggle with balancing careers and family, as well as life after the death of one’s child.

title: Back to 1989
synopsis: A young man whos learned nothing about his father from his single mom has a freak accident that sends him back to 1989, the year before he was born.

title: The Beat
synopsis: The artistic pursuits of two childhood friends, an aspiring singer and a talented dancer, lead them to four other 20-somethings in a drumming group.

title: Love Storm
synopsis: Three grown siblings must rethink their idea of family when they learn their parents are getting divorced and have their eyes on new partners.

title: Exclusive Edition
synopsis: Young journalists working for a magazine juggle careers, romance and other challenges while reporting on social issues and news stories in Malaysia.

title: Have You Ever Fallen in Love, Miss Jiang?
synopsis: A new teacher finds herself in an unenviable situation after witnessing a troubling interaction between an administrator and a student.

title: Timeless Season
synopsis: A decade after college, a wake reunites five female friends struggling with illness, infidelity, toxic in-laws, spousal abuse and other life issues.

title: A House of Blocks
synopsis: Yijuan and her mentally ill sister Kaiqi struggle to be happy in the face of misfortune, criminal intrigue, marital strife, an exorcism and a ghost.

title: All About Love
synopsis: Mysterious ghosts -- determined to reconnect with the living world -- begin to cross over and disrupt the lives of those they left behind.

title: Glowing Embers
synopsis: Amid Malaysias charcoal industry, a woman deftly adapts to her environs as she juggles three men in her life: her husband, her lover and her friend.

title: A Taiwanese Tale of Two Cities
synopsis: A Taipei doctor and a San Francisco engineer swap homes in a daring pact, embarking on journeys filled with trials, secrets and unexpected encounters.

title: Laws of Attraction
synopsis: Four couples -- a speed-dating pair, a husband and wife, a man living with an older woman and co-workers with opposite views -- weather ups and downs.

title: The Iron Lady
synopsis: After business troubles destroy her father, a headstrong young woman does battle with her deeply patriarchal culture to secure her familys legacy.

title: Age of Glory
synopsis: Amid the thriving nightlife of 1960s Kuala Lumpur, three Chinese friends -- a showgirl, her housekeeper and a chanteuse -- find love and heartbreak.

title: The Adjusters
synopsis: An insurance adjuster investigates cases of possible fraud while hiding a romance with a colleague, unaware that someone he trusts is toying with him.

title: Forget Me Not
synopsis: Teenage Xue Ming was forced to marry the man who raped her. Years after abandoning her young sons to find a better life, can she escape the guilt?

title: Fall in Love with Me
synopsis: The head of a struggling ad agency finds herself torn between a hotshot executive and a kind stranger -- not realizing theyre the same person.

title: OCTB
synopsis: An undercover detective crosses paths with familiar faces in the mafia underworld during the final years of Britains ruling of Hong Kong.

title: Someone Like You
synopsis: After losing his sight and his fiancee in an accident, a man hires a caregiver who mysteriously sounds -- and looks -- just like his late girlfriend.

title: In Laws
synopsis: Once domineered by her own mother, a well-meaning matriarch has trouble being lax with her children, especially when her daughter-in-law moves in.

title: Cheuk Wan-Chi: Two Night Stand
synopsis: Writer and stand-up comedian Cheuk Wan-chi cracks wise at the follies of single womanhood and takes on politics in Hong Kong with nuance and flair.

title: Chosen
synopsis: When a mysterious box arrives at his door, a doctor and father is forced to participate in a twisted killing game, or risk losing everything.

title: Wake Up
synopsis: After taking the blame for a patient death, an anesthesiologist battling psychiatric trauma fights to stay afloat in the corrupt hospital system.

title: 海的儿子
synopsis: Two brothers start a new life in Singapore, where they run into a childhood friend who falls in love with the elder while attracting the younger.

title: Goodnight DJ 1
synopsis: Young radio announcers from varying backgrounds encounter the supernatural in mysterious dreams, accidents and everyday life.

title: Trio and a Bed
synopsis: After graduation, three women from distinct backgrounds find themselves in the real world, facing the challenges of work, romance and unexpected fame.

title: A Love So Beautiful
synopsis: The ups and downs of school, family and growing up test the affection between a budding artist and her handsome but indifferent classmate and neighbor.

title: Dancing Angels
synopsis: A group of aspiring young musicians yearn for stardom while navigating the ups and downs of friendship, romance, and life at school.

title: Precious Youth
synopsis: Years after falling in love -- and deciding to part ways -- Xiao Xiaojun and Liu Ting cross paths again while pursuing two very different destinies.

title: First Love
synopsis: Years after she left her daughter with them to raise, Xiaomeng drives a wedge between best pals Zaijun and Lei when she suddenly reenters their life.

title: Lucky Days
synopsis: When laidback Ren, who is about to divorce his money-crazy wife, finds a time-traveling computer, he decides to use it to reboot his marriage.

title: Women on the Breadfruit Tree
synopsis: Three best friends who would do anything for one another put their commitment to the test as they help one another navigate their respective romances.

title: Auntie Duohe
synopsis: After losing her kin in the wake of the Second Sino-Japanese War, a Japanese girl in China stays to live with a traditional Chinese family.

title: Be with Me
synopsis: They were the boy band to beat until fame tore them apart. Ten years later, five friends and an ex-love reunite and find themselves closer than ever.

title: If Life Cheats You
synopsis: Romantic troubles roil a family as its members follow their hearts, use marriage for career advancement and become blind to loves deceit.

title: When I See You Again
synopsis: On a visit to his hometown, a rich bachelor seeks revenge on the woman who broke his heart 10 years ago. But his plan doesnt go as expected.

title: Inborn Pair
synopsis: Betrothed while in utero, a resort group president enters into an arranged marriage with a legal assistant. Despite their bickering, love blooms.

title: Shia Wa Se
synopsis: A Taiwan restaurant is like home to its many customers, who love the atmosphere in the family-run business, but the family isnt real at all, for now.

title: Love You
synopsis: Two heartbroken strangers go on a bender and drunkenly elope. After coming to their senses, they try to undo the past 24 hours, but fate intervenes.

title: Love Me or Leave Me
synopsis: When a marriage-phobic woman hires a seductress to test how faithful her eager-to-wed boyfriend is, her plan takes an unexpected turn.

title: Happy 300 Days
synopsis: An unexpected pregnancy sends a woman back to her hometown to share a house with three nice guys. Each has problems, but each would make a great dad.

title: Doubles Cause Troubles
synopsis: When the tenant in their flat dies under suspicious circumstances, two bickering cousins are forced to navigate both sides of the law.

title: Keep the Marriage as Jade
synopsis: In the wake of infidelity, betrayal and the troubles of middle age, an attractive couple attempt to save their seemingly perfect marriage.

title: Love Family
synopsis: A wealthy heirs search for a nameless childhood sweetheart leads him to an inn run by a family with three sisters. But which one is his true love?

title: Easy Fortune Happy Life
synopsis: Years after a wealthy man is healed by a rural herbalist, fate lands him in the same hospital where the womans granddaughter is treating patients.

title: Prince Charming
synopsis: Two young buddies seek love in Hawaii, and upon returning home in disappointment, soon entangle themselves in a messy identity swap.

title: Take My Brother Away
synopsis: Bickering siblings Shi Miao and Shi Fen tackle friendship matters, school drama and the pitfalls of growing up with little parental supervision.

title: Romance of Our Parents
synopsis: An elderly couple look back on their lives from the time when he was a naval officer who fell in love with a girl from a different background.

title: Two Fathers
synopsis: When two single guys learn a woman they both slept with disappeared after giving birth, they decide to raise her baby girl together as a family.

title: Pretty Man
synopsis: Doomed by misunderstandings, two middle-school classmates miss their shot at love -- but a twist of fate brings them together years later.

title: On Children
synopsis: These uncanny tales reveal a world where individuals face the tragic consequences of social pressure, parental oppression and family dysfunction.

title: Age of Rebellion
synopsis: At their high school, a group of unruly teens wreak havoc, face bullies and navigate turbulent lives beyond school grounds.

title: Ex-Boyfriend
synopsis: Still haunted by the traumatic event that ended her high school romance, a young professional gets a new subordinate: her former sweetheart.

title: Footprints in the Sand
synopsis: Familial bonds strain as dramas concerning love, greed, business and generosity simmer across generations.
